alert.note: Alert for Shelby (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 24 at 7:35PM CST until February 25 at 8:00AM CST by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is cancelled for the following rivers in Tennessee... Wolf River near Rossville ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Tennessee... Wolf River at Germantown For the Wolf River...including Rossville, Germantown...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL TOMORROW MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Wolf River at Germantown. * WHEN...Until tomorrow morning. * IMPACTS...At 21.0 feet, Greenway flooding along the Wolf River is extensive from Houston Levee Road to Interstate 40. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 6:45 PM CST Thursday the stage was 20.9 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage just after midnight tonight and continue falling to 9.5 feet Tuesday evening. - Flood stage is 20.5 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Additional information is available at weather.gov/memphis. The next statement will be issued as conditions warrant.
